about_the_game:
"We are an independent game studio made up of a passionate team of four. As gamers ourselves, we understand what makes a game special, and we’re dedicated to crafting every detail to deliver an exceptional experience."



An upcoming sci fi Co-Op TPS game being created in Unreal Engine 5.



Enter the futuristic world of Mortal Void, a thrilling third-person shooter where you and your Cosmobot, a powerful robotic companion, face off against deadly enemy robots. Choose your Cosmobot wisely and team up for intense cooperative gameplay, where strategy and skill are essential for survival.



In the distant future, humanity discovers the ominous Mortal Void, a galaxy ruled by a malevolent AI and its deadly machines, the Nullons. To combat this threat, an elite force known as the Void Sentinels, each partnered with a Cosmobot, is sent to uncover the mysteries and protect the universe.



Mortal Void is set on alien planets ravaged by Nullons, each with unique landscapes and dangers. Players reside on a customizable spaceship that serves as a hub for strategizing and upgrading before embarking on missions.

Mission Duration
Missions range from quick, 10-minute skirmishes to longer, 40-minute operations, offering a variety of gameplay experiences.

Pre-Mission Equipment Selection
Before each mission, players select their gear and equipment, strategizing to face the challenges ahead.

Characters
Players are Void Sentinels, each with a unique Cosmobot ally, battling against the ruthless Nullons—mechanical killers from the Mortal Void.

Game Objectives
Objectives vary by mission, including surviving enemy assaults, retrieving resources, defending locations, escorting allies, and destroying key Nullon targets.

Levels and Scenarios
Explore diverse planets with unique challenges, from abandoned outposts to jungle worlds, futuristic cities, icy moons, and war-torn landscapes.

Void Sentinel Spaceship
Your customizable spaceship is your base of operations, social hub, and key to exploring the Mortal Void galaxy.



Engage in immersive third-person shooting, resupply with your spacecraft, and use a variety of weapons and grenades to outsmart increasingly tough enemies.



Utilize your Cosmobot’s abilities, master diverse weapons, and earn rewards by excelling in combat and leveling up your account.



Progression System
Earn XP to level up, unlocking ability upgrades, character and Cosmobot customization, and weapon enhancements.

Competitive Mode
Test your skills in competitive mode, where enemy difficulty scales with your abilities. Climb the ELO-based ranking system to prove yourself as the best in Mortal Void.



Our passion for science fiction comes together with our experience of gaming, where every detail is a testament to our commitment.
We can't wait to share more about Mortal Void as the release date approaches. join us on this adventure!

Best regards

Neo Game Lab Team

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS / Bazzite
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470 Shader Model 5.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS @1280x720 Medium Settings
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS / Bazzite
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS @1920x1080 Ultra Settings

short_description: Mortal Void is a co-op PvE squad shooter set in a distant galaxy. Assemble your team, customize your robot companion, and unleash its unique abilities
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
